00022 #define                 LIFE_BAR_SHADOW                                       FROMRGB( 108, 12, 12 )
00023 #define                 LIFE_BAR                                                          FROMRGB( 200, 0, 0 )
00024 #define                 BANDAGE_BAR_SHADOW                              FROMRGB( 156, 60, 60 )
00025 #define                 BANDAGE_BAR                                                 FROMRGB( 222, 132, 132 )
00026 #define                 BLEEDING_BAR_SHADOW                             FROMRGB( 128, 128, 60 )
00027 #define                 BLEEDING_BAR                                                FROMRGB( 240,  240, 20 )
00028 #define                 CURR_BREATH_BAR_SHADOW              FROMRGB( 8,       12, 118 ) // the MAX max breatth, always at 100%
00029 #define                 CURR_BREATH_BAR                                       FROMRGB( 8,       12, 160 )
00030 #define     CURR_MAX_BREATH                                       FROMRGB( 0,       0,    0           ) // the current max breath, black
00031 #define     CURR_MAX_BREATH_SHADOW              FROMRGB( 0,       0,    0           )

00048 // car portraits
00049 enum{
00050       ELDORADO_PORTRAIT =0,
00051       HUMMER_PORTRAIT,
00052       ICE_CREAM_TRUCT_PORTRAIT,
00053       JEEP_PORTRAIT,
00054       NUMBER_CAR_PORTRAITS,

00056 
00057 // the ids for the car portraits
00058 INT32 giCarPortraits[ 4 ] = { -1, -1, -1, -1 };
00059 
00060 // the car portrait file names
00061 STR pbCarPortraitFileNames[ ]={
00062       "INTERFACE\\eldorado.sti",
00063       "INTERFACE\\Hummer.sti",
00064       "INTERFACE\\ice Cream Truck.sti",
00065       "INTERFACE\\Jeep.sti",
00066 };

00069 // load int he portraits for the car faces that will be use in mapscreen
00070 BOOLEAN LoadCarPortraitValues( void )
00071 {
00072       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00073       VOBJECT_DESC     VObjectDesc;
00074 
00075       if( giCarPortraits[ 0 ] != -1 )
00076       {
00077             return FALSE;
00078       }
00079       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_CAR_PORTRAITS; iCounter++ )
00080       {
00081             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags = VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00082             sprintf( VObjectDesc.ImageFile, pbCarPortraitFileNames[ iCounter ] );
00083             CHECKF( AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, (UINT32 *)&giCarPortraits[ iCounter ] ) );
00084       }
00085       return( TRUE );
00086 }
00087 
00088 // get rid of the images we loaded for the mapscreen car portraits
00089 void UnLoadCarPortraits( void )
00090 {
00091       INT32 iCounter = 0;
00092 
00093       // car protraits loaded?
00094       if( giCarPortraits[ 0 ] == -1 )
00095       {
00096             return;
00097       }
00098       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < NUMBER_CAR_PORTRAITS; iCounter++ )
00099       {
00100             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( giCarPortraits[ iCounter ] );
00101             giCarPortraits[ iCounter ] = -1;
00102       }
00103       return;
00104 }

00108 void DrawLifeUIBarEx( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sXPos, INT16 sYPos, INT16 sWidth, INT16 sHeight, BOOLEAN fErase, UINT32 uiBuffer )
00109 {
00110       FLOAT                                                              dStart, dEnd, dPercentage;
00111       //UINT16                                                           usLineColor;
00112 
00113       UINT32                                                             uiDestPitchBYTES;
00114       UINT8                                                              *pDestBuf;
00115       UINT16                                                             usLineColor;
00116       INT8                                                               bBandage;
00117 
00118       // Erase what was there
00119       if( fErase )
00120       {
00121             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sXPos, (INT16)(sYPos - sHeight), sWidth, (INT16)(sHeight + 1 ) );
00122       }
00123 
00124       if( pSoldier->bLife == 0 )
00125       {
00126             // are they dead?
00127             return;
00128       }
00129 
00130       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( uiBuffer, &uiDestPitchBYTES );             
00131       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00132 
00133 
00134       // FIRST DO MAX LIFE
00135       dPercentage = (FLOAT)pSoldier->bLife / (FLOAT)100;
00136       dEnd                    =     dPercentage * sHeight;
00137       dStart                  = sYPos;
00138 
00139       usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( LIFE_BAR_SHADOW );
00140       RectangleDraw( TRUE, sXPos, (INT32)dStart, sXPos, (INT32)( dStart - dEnd ) , usLineColor, pDestBuf ); 
00141 
00142       usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( LIFE_BAR );
00143       RectangleDraw( TRUE, sXPos+ 1, (INT32)dStart, sXPos + 1, (INT32)( dStart - dEnd ), usLineColor, pDestBuf ); 
00144 
00145       usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( LIFE_BAR_SHADOW );
00146       RectangleDraw( TRUE, sXPos+ 2, (INT32)dStart, sXPos + 2, (INT32)( dStart - dEnd ), usLineColor, pDestBuf ); 
00147 
00148       // NOW DO BANDAGE
00149 
00150       // Calculate bandage
00151       bBandage = pSoldier->bLifeMax - pSoldier->bLife - pSoldier->bBleeding;
00152 
00153       if ( bBandage )
00154       {
00155             dPercentage = (FLOAT)bBandage / (FLOAT)100;
00156             dStart                  = (FLOAT)( sYPos - dEnd );
00157             dEnd                    =     ( dPercentage * sHeight );
00158 
00159             usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( BANDAGE_BAR_SHADOW );
00160             RectangleDraw( TRUE, sXPos, (INT32)dStart, sXPos, (INT32)( dStart - dEnd ) , usLineColor, pDestBuf ); 
00161       
00162             usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( BANDAGE_BAR );
00163             RectangleDraw( TRUE, sXPos+ 1, (INT32)dStart, sXPos + 1, (INT32)( dStart - dEnd ), usLineColor, pDestBuf ); 
00164 
00165             usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( BANDAGE_BAR_SHADOW );
00166             RectangleDraw( TRUE, sXPos+ 2, (INT32)dStart, sXPos + 2, (INT32)( dStart - dEnd ), usLineColor, pDestBuf ); 
00167       }
00168 
00169       // NOW DO BLEEDING
00170       if ( pSoldier->bBleeding )
00171       {
00172             dPercentage = (FLOAT)pSoldier->bBleeding / (FLOAT)100;
00173             dStart                  = (FLOAT)( dStart - dEnd );
00174             dEnd                    =     ( dPercentage * sHeight );
00175 
00176             usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( BLEEDING_BAR_SHADOW );
00177             RectangleDraw( TRUE, sXPos, (INT32)dStart, sXPos, (INT32)( dStart - dEnd ) , usLineColor, pDestBuf ); 
00178       
00179             usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( BLEEDING_BAR );
00180             RectangleDraw( TRUE, sXPos+ 1, (INT32)dStart, sXPos + 1, (INT32)( dStart - dEnd ), usLineColor, pDestBuf ); 
00181 
00182             usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( BLEEDING_BAR_SHADOW );
00183             RectangleDraw( TRUE, sXPos+ 2, (INT32)dStart, sXPos + 2, (INT32)( dStart - dEnd ), usLineColor, pDestBuf ); 
00184       }
00185             
00186       UnLockVideoSurface( uiBuffer );
00187 
00188 }

00216       dPercentage = 1.;
00217       dEnd                    =     dPercentage * sHeight;

00221       GetVideoObject( &hHandle, guiBrownBackgroundForTeamPanel );

00224       if( guiCurrentScreen != MAP_SCREEN )

00240       {
00241             // brown, first entry

00243 
00244       }

00247       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );

00263             RectangleDraw( TRUE, sXPos+ 2, (INT32)dStart, sXPos + 2, (INT32)( dStart - dEnd ), usLineColor, pDestBuf );

00347 void DrawItemUIBarEx( OBJECTTYPE *pObject, UINT8 ubStatus, INT16 sXPos, INT16 sYPos, INT16 sWidth, INT16 sHeight, INT16 sColor1, INT16 sColor2, BOOLEAN fErase, UINT32 uiBuffer )
00348 {
00349       FLOAT                                                              dStart, dEnd, dPercentage;
00350       //UINT16                                                           usLineColor;
00351 
00352       UINT32                                                             uiDestPitchBYTES;
00353       UINT8                                                              *pDestBuf;
00354       UINT16                                                             usLineColor;
00355       INT16                                                              sValue;
00356 
00357       
00358       if ( ubStatus >= DRAW_ITEM_STATUS_ATTACHMENT1 )
00359       {
00360             sValue = pObject->bAttachStatus[ ubStatus - DRAW_ITEM_STATUS_ATTACHMENT1 ];
00361       }
00362       else
00363       {
00364             sValue = pObject->bStatus[ ubStatus ];
00365       }
00366 
00367       // Adjust for ammo, other thingys..
00368       if( Item[ pObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_AMMO )
00369       {
00370              
00371             sValue = sValue * 100 / Magazine[ Item[ pObject->usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize;
00372 
00373             if ( sValue < 0 )
00374             {
00375                   sValue = pObject->ubShotsLeft[0] * 100 / Magazine[ Item[ pObject->usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize;
00376                   DebugMsg ( TOPIC_JA2, DBG_LEVEL_3, String("Ammo status: shots left %d * 100 / Mag Size %d = value %d",pObject->ubShotsLeft[0],Magazine[ Item[ pObject->usItem ].ubClassIndex ].ubMagSize,sValue ));
00377             }
00378             if ( sValue > 100 )
00379             {
00380                   sValue = 100;
00381             }
00382 
00383       }
00384 
00385       if( Item[ pObject->usItem ].usItemClass & IC_KEY )
00386       {
00387             sValue =100;
00388       }
00389 
00390   // ATE: Subtract 1 to exagerate bad status
00391   if ( sValue < 100 && sValue > 1 )
00392   {
00393     sValue--;
00394   }
00395 
00396       // Erase what was there
00397       if ( fErase )
00398       {
00399             //RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sXPos, (INT16)(sYPos - sHeight), sWidth, (INT16)(sHeight + 1 ) );
00400       }
00401 
00402       pDestBuf = LockVideoSurface( uiBuffer, &uiDestPitchBYTES );             
00403       SetClippingRegionAndImageWidth( uiDestPitchBYTES, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
00404 
00405 
00406       // FIRST DO BREATH
00407       dPercentage = (FLOAT)sValue / (FLOAT)100;
00408       dEnd                    =     dPercentage * sHeight;
00409       dStart                  = sYPos;
00410 
00411       //usLineColor = Get16BPPColor( STATUS_BAR );
00412       usLineColor = sColor1;
00413       RectangleDraw( TRUE, sXPos, (INT32)dStart, sXPos, (INT32)( dStart - dEnd ) , usLineColor, pDestBuf ); 
00414 
00415       usLineColor = sColor2;
00416       RectangleDraw( TRUE, sXPos+ 1, (INT32)dStart, sXPos + 1, (INT32)( dStart - dEnd ), usLineColor, pDestBuf ); 
00417 
00418             
00419       UnLockVideoSurface( uiBuffer );
00420 
00421       if ( uiBuffer == guiSAVEBUFFER )
00422       {
00423             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sXPos, (INT16)(sYPos - sHeight), sWidth, (INT16)(sHeight + 1 ) );
00424       }
00425       else
00426       {
00427             InvalidateRegion( sXPos, (INT16)(sYPos - sHeight), sXPos + sWidth, (INT16)(sYPos + 1 ) );
00428       }
00429 
00430 }

00432 void RenderSoldierFace( SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier, INT16 sFaceX, INT16 sFaceY, BOOLEAN fAutoFace )
00433 {
00434       BOOLEAN fDoFace = FALSE;
00435       INT32       iFaceIndex = -1;
00436       UINT8 ubVehicleType = 0;
00437 
00438 
00439       if ( pSoldier->bActive )
00440       {
00441 
00442             if( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE )
00443             {
00444                   // get the type of vehicle
00445                   ubVehicleType = pVehicleList[ pSoldier->bVehicleID ].ubVehicleType;
00446 
00447                   // just draw the vehicle
00448                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, giCarPortraits[ ubVehicleType ], 0, sFaceX, sFaceY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00449                   RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sFaceX, sFaceY, FACE_WIDTH, FACE_HEIGHT );
00450 
00451                   return;
00452             }
00453 
00454             if ( fAutoFace )
00455             {
00456                   // OK, check if this face actually went active...
00457                   if ( gFacesData[ pSoldier->iFaceIndex ].uiFlags & FACE_INACTIVE_HANDLED_ELSEWHERE )
00458                   {
00459                         // Render as an extern face...
00460                         fAutoFace = FALSE;
00461                   }     
00462                   else
00463                   {
00464                         SetAutoFaceActiveFromSoldier( FRAME_BUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, pSoldier->ubID , sFaceX, sFaceY );
00465                   //    SetAutoFaceActiveFromSoldier( FRAME_BUFFER, FACE_AUTO_RESTORE_BUFFER, pSoldier->ubID , sFaceX, sFaceY );
00466                   }
00467             }
00468 
00469             fDoFace = TRUE;
00470 
00471             if ( fDoFace )
00472             {
00473                   if ( fAutoFace )
00474                   {
00475                         RenderAutoFaceFromSoldier( pSoldier->ubID );
00476                   }
00477                   else
00478                   {
00479                         ExternRenderFaceFromSoldier( guiSAVEBUFFER, pSoldier->ubID, sFaceX, sFaceY );
00480                   }
00481             }
00482       }
00483       else
00484       {
00485             // Put close panel there
00486             //if(gbPixelDepth==16)
00487             //{
00488                   BltVideoObjectFromIndex( guiSAVEBUFFER, guiCLOSE, 5, sFaceX, sFaceY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
00489             //}
00490             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( sFaceX, sFaceY, FACE_WIDTH, FACE_HEIGHT );
00491       }
00492 
00493 }
